divs: Sighting DetailsI was visiting my mother in Oklahoma City the weekend of January 5. It was about 11:30 p.m. and it was hot in her home and so I cracked open a window above the bed I was sleeping in. I was alone in the bedroom. I had dozed off when as clear as day I heard someone tell me "Hello." But the voice did not come from outside, it came from within my head. It's so hard to describe. I know it wasn't a dream. At first, I thought someone had broken into the house and was in my room. So, I laid very still waiting to hear some kind of noise - nothing. Then I remembered I had cracked open the window and thought that the person was outside the window. Without looking out the window, I reached up and closed the window. The voice didn't return but as I laid there trying to hear anymore sounds that might indicate there was an intruder around the house, I noticed the neighborhood dogs were barking in a crazy way that I've never heard before. It almost sounded like a panic. After a few minutes, I fell asleep and woke up in another hour when my daughter returned from a date. I live in Dallas and with the news of the sightings in Stephenville, I was curious if anyone had come forward with any reports of being contacted. I know reporting this is a lot riskier than reporting a sighting but it's very unnerving when something like this happens - especially when you feel like you've been mentally violated or penetrated, for lack of a better description. At any rate, it has not happened again to my recollection.
trends: There have been 78 other sightings in Oklahoma City
There were no other sightings in Oklahoma City on or around January 5th 2008
